trans-unit.source: Represents a node of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa um nó de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> collection holds all the child TreeNode objects assigned to the current TreeNode.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>coleção contém todos os filhos TreeNode objetos atribuídos ao atual TreeNode.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can add, remove, or clone a TreeNode; when you do this, all child tree nodes are added, removed, or cloned.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar, remover ou clonar um TreeNode; Quando você fizer isso, todos os nós de árvore filho são adicionados, removidos ou clonados.

trans-unit.source: Each TreeNode can contain a collection of other TreeNode objects.
trans-unit.target: Cada TreeNode pode conter uma coleção de outros objetos TreeNode.

trans-unit.source: This can make it difficult to determine where you are in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> when iterating through the collection.
trans-unit.target: Isso pode tornar difícil determinar onde você está no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>ao fazer a iteração pela coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: To determine your location in a tree structure, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o local em uma estrutura de árvore, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A> string can be parsed using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A> string value to determine where a TreeNode label begins and ends.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A>cadeia de caracteres pode ser analisada usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A>cadeia de caracteres de valor para determinar onde um rótulo TreeNode começa e termina.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A>

trans-unit.source: The TreeNode label is set by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A> property explicitly.
trans-unit.target: A etiqueta TreeNode está definida, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A>propriedade explicitamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: The alternative is to create the tree node using one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.%23ctor%2A> constructors that has a string parameter that represents the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A alternativa é criar o nó de árvore usando uma da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.%23ctor%2A>construtores que tem um parâmetro de cadeia de caracteres que representa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The label is displayed next to the TreeNode image, if one is displayed.
trans-unit.target: O rótulo é exibido ao lado da imagem TreeNode, caso seja exibida.

trans-unit.source: To display images next to the tree nodes, assign an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control and assign an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> by referencing its index value in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> property.
trans-unit.target: Para exibir imagens ao lado de nós de árvore, atribuir um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A>propriedade do pai <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlar e atribuir um <xref:System.Drawing.Image>fazendo referência a seu valor de índice no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A> property to the index value of the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> you want to display when the TreeNode is in an unselected state.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A>propriedade para o valor de índice a <xref:System.Drawing.Image>você deseja exibir quando o TreeNode está em um estado desmarcado.</xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Likewise, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A> property to the index value of the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> you want to display when the TreeNode is selected.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A>propriedade para o valor de índice a <xref:System.Drawing.Image>você deseja exibir quando o TreeNode está selecionado.</xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Selecting specific tree nodes and iterating through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A> collection can be achieved by using the following property values: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FirstNode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.LastNode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.NextNode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.PrevNode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.NextVisibleNode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.PrevVisibleNode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Seleção de nós de árvore específico e iterar por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A>coleção pode ser obtida usando os valores de propriedade a seguir: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FirstNode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.LastNode%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.NextNode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.PrevNode%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.NextVisibleNode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.PrevVisibleNode%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.PrevVisibleNode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.NextVisibleNode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.PrevNode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.NextNode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.LastNode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FirstNode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: Assign the TreeNode returned by one of aforementioned properties to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to select that tree node in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: Atribuir o TreeNode retornado por uma das propriedades mencionadas anteriormente para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para selecionar o nó na árvore de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Tree nodes can be expanded to display the next level of child tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: Nós de árvore podem ser expandidos para exibir o próximo nível filho de nós de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The user can expand the TreeNode by pressing the plus (+) button next to the TreeNode, if one is displayed, or you can expand the TreeNode by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O usuário pode expandir o TreeNode pressionando o sinal de mais (+) botão ao lado de TreeNode, se uma é exibida, ou você pode expandir o TreeNode chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A>

trans-unit.source: To expand all child tree node levels in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> collection, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para expandir todos os níveis de nó de árvore filho no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>coleção, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can collapse the child TreeNode level by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Collapse%2A> method, or the user can press the minus (-) button next to the TreeNode, if one is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Você pode recolher o TreeNode nível filho chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Collapse%2A>método ou o usuário pode pressionar o sinal de menos (-) botão ao lado de TreeNode, caso seja exibida.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Collapse%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Toggle%2A> method to alternate the TreeNode between the expanded and collapsed states.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Toggle%2A>método para alternar entre os estados expandidos e recolhidos TreeNode.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Toggle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Tree nodes can optionally display a check box.
trans-unit.target: Nós de árvore, opcionalmente, podem exibir uma caixa de seleção.

trans-unit.source: To display the check boxes, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para exibir as caixas de seleção, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>para `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A> property is set to `true` for tree nodes that are in a checked state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>está definida como `true` para nós de árvore que estão em um estado selecionado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> class with the specified label text.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> classe com o texto do rótulo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The `text` parameter value is assigned to the node's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A> property and becomes the tree node label.
trans-unit.target: O `text` valor do parâmetro é atribuído para o nó <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A>propriedade e se torna o rótulo do nó de árvore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: The label <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text*> of the new tree node.
trans-unit.target: O rótulo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text*>do novo nó de árvore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> class using the specified serialization information and context.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> usando as informações de serialização e contexto de classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that contains the data to deserialize the class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> que contém os dados para desserializar a classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains the source and destination of the serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>que contém a origem e o destino do fluxo serializado.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> class with the specified label text and child tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> classe com os nós de árvore de texto e o filho do rótulo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The `text` parameter value is assigned to the node's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A> property and becomes the tree node label.
trans-unit.target: O `text` valor do parâmetro é atribuído para o nó <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A>propriedade e se torna o rótulo do nó de árvore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: The tree nodes that are contained in the `children` array are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection> that is stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Os nós de árvore que estão contidos no `children` matriz são adicionados para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>que é armazenado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: The label <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text*> of the new tree node.
trans-unit.target: O rótulo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text*>do novo nó de árvore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text*>

trans-unit.source: An array of child <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de filho <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> class with the specified label text and images to display when the tree node is in a selected and unselected state.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> classe com o texto de rótulo especificado e imagens a serem exibidas quando o nó de árvore está no estado selecionado e não selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The `text` parameter value is assigned to the node's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A> property and becomes the tree node label.
trans-unit.target: O `text` valor do parâmetro é atribuído para o nó <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A>propriedade e se torna o rótulo do nó de árvore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `imageIndex` and `selectedImageIndex` values are the index values of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: O `imageIndex` e `selectedImageIndex` valores são os valores de índice de um <xref:System.Drawing.Image>armazenados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>atribuído para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: The image referenced in the `imageIndex` property is displayed when the tree node is not selected.
trans-unit.target: A imagem referenciada no `imageIndex` propriedade é exibida quando o nó de árvore não está selecionado.

trans-unit.source: Likewise, the image referenced in the `selectedImageIndex` property is displayed when the tree node is in a selected state.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, a imagem referenciada no `selectedImageIndex` propriedade é exibida quando o nó de árvore está no estado selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The label <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text*> of the new tree node.
trans-unit.target: O rótulo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text*>do novo nó de árvore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text*>

trans-unit.source: The index value of <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to display when the tree node is unselected.
trans-unit.target: O valor de índice <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> a ser exibida quando o nó de árvore é desmarcado.

trans-unit.source: The index value of <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to display when the tree node is selected.
trans-unit.target: O valor de índice <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> a ser exibida quando o nó de árvore é selecionado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> class with the specified label text, child tree nodes, and images to display when the tree node is in a selected and unselected state.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> classe com o texto do rótulo especificado, nós de árvore filho e imagens a serem exibidas quando o nó de árvore está no estado selecionado e não selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The `text` parameter value is assigned to the node's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A> property and becomes the tree node label.
trans-unit.target: O `text` valor do parâmetro é atribuído para o nó <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A>propriedade e se torna o rótulo do nó de árvore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `imageIndex` and `selectedImageIndex` values are the index values of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: O `imageIndex` e `selectedImageIndex` valores são os valores de índice de um <xref:System.Drawing.Image>armazenados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>atribuído para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: The image referenced in the `imageIndex` parameter is displayed when the tree node is not selected.
trans-unit.target: A imagem referenciada no `imageIndex` parâmetro é exibido quando o nó de árvore não está selecionado.

trans-unit.source: Likewise, the image referenced in the `selectedImageIndex` parameter is displayed when the tree node is in a selected state.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, a imagem referenciada no `selectedImageIndex` parâmetro é exibido quando o nó de árvore está no estado selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The tree nodes that are contained in the `children` array are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection> that is stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Os nós de árvore que estão contidos no `children` matriz são adicionados para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>que é armazenado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: The label <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text*> of the new tree node.
trans-unit.target: O rótulo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text*>do novo nó de árvore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text*>

trans-unit.source: The index value of <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to display when the tree node is unselected.
trans-unit.target: O valor de índice <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> a ser exibida quando o nó de árvore é desmarcado.

trans-unit.source: The index value of <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to display when the tree node is selected.
trans-unit.target: O valor de índice <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> a ser exibida quando o nó de árvore é selecionado.

trans-unit.source: An array of child <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de filho <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of the tree node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor de plano de fundo do nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: If the BackColor property is set to <xref:System.Drawing.Color?displayProperty=fullName>, the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> used is the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> property value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control that the tree node is assigned to.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade BackColor é definida como <xref:System.Drawing.Color?displayProperty=fullName>, o <xref:System.Drawing.Color>usado é o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>valor da propriedade a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controle que o nó de árvore está atribuído.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Color> </xref:System.Drawing.Color?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The background <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the tree node.
trans-unit.target: O plano de fundo <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> do nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initiates the editing of the tree node label.
trans-unit.target: Inicia a edição do rótulo do nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: A typical scenario to use this method is to call it on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>.
trans-unit.target: Um cenário típico para usar esse método é chamá-lo no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click>caso de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method only works if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.LabelEdit%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Esse método só funcionará se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.LabelEdit%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>é definido como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.LabelEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.LabelEdit%2A> is set to `false`, an exception is thrown and the tree node will not be put into an editable state.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.LabelEdit%2A>for definido como `false`, uma exceção será lançada e o nó de árvore não será colocado em um estado editável.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.LabelEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.LabelEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <XRef:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.LabelEdit%2a?displayProperty=FullName> é definido como <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounds of the tree node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os limites do nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The coordinates are relative to the upper-left corner of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: As coordenadas são em relação ao canto superior esquerdo do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the tree node.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa os limites do nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the tree node is in a checked state.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o nó de árvore está no estado de ativação.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the tree node is in a checked state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o nó de árvore está no estado de ativação; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the tree node and the entire subtree rooted at this tree node.
trans-unit.target: Copia o nó de árvore e a subárvore inteira com raiz neste nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The tree structure from the tree node being cloned and below is copied.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura de árvore do nó de árvore que está sendo clonado e abaixo é copiada.

trans-unit.source: Any child tree nodes assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> being cloned are included in the new tree node and subtree.
trans-unit.target: Nós de árvore filho atribuídos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>que está sendo clonado estão incluídos no novo nó de árvore e subárvore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The Clone method performs a shallow copy of the node.
trans-unit.target: O método Clone executa uma cópia superficial do nó.

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Tag%2A> property is a reference type, both the original and cloned copy will point to the same single instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Tag%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Tag%2A>é um tipo de referência, a cópia original e clonada apontará para a mesma instância única do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Tag%2A>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Tag%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Tag%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>que representa o clonado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Collapses the tree node.
trans-unit.target: Recolhe o nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The Collapse method collapses the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> and its child nodes.
trans-unit.target: O método Collapse recolhe atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>e seus nós filho.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: If you want to collapse only the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Collapse%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName> overload, passing `true` to ignore its child nodes.
trans-unit.target: Se desejar recolher somente atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Collapse%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>sobrecarga, passando `true` para ignorar os nós filho.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Collapse%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The state of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> is persisted.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O estado de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>é persistente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the next level of child nodes was not collapsed previously, when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A> method is called, the child nodes appear in their previously expanded state.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o próximo nível de nós filho não foi recolhido anteriormente, quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A>método é chamado, os nós filho aparecem no estado expandido anteriormente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A>

trans-unit.source: Collapses the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> and optionally collapses its children.
trans-unit.target: Recolhe o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> e, opcionalmente, recolhe seus filhos.

trans-unit.source: Use the Collapse method, passing `true`, when you want to collapse a node but leave its child nodes in their expanded state.
trans-unit.target: Use o método de recolher, passando `true`, para recolher um nó, mas deixar seu filho de nós em seu estado expandido.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to leave the child nodes in their current state; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to collapse the child nodes.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para deixar o filho de nós em seu estado atual; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para recolher os nós filho.

trans-unit.source: Gets the shortcut menu that is associated with this tree node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o menu de atalho que está associado este nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to associate a shortcut menu with a tree node is with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: É a melhor maneira de associar um menu de atalho um nó de árvore com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ContextMenuStrip%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu"></xref> that is associated with the tree node.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu"> </xref> que está associado com o nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shortcut menu associated with this tree node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o menu de atalho associado a este nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The shortcut menu is shown when the user right-clicks the tree node.
trans-unit.target: O menu de atalho é exibido quando o usuário clica no nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> associated with the tree node.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref> associada ao nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: Loads the state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> from the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Carrega o estado do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> especificado <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that describes the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> que descreve o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that indicates the state of the stream during deserialization.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>que indica o estado do fluxo durante a desserialização.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Ends the editing of the tree node label.
trans-unit.target: Termina a edição do rótulo do nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the editing of the tree node label text was canceled without being saved; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a edição do texto do rótulo de nó de árvore foi cancelada sem ser salvado; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the tree node is visible, expanding tree nodes and scrolling the tree view control as necessary.
trans-unit.target: Garante que o nó de árvore está visível, expansão de nós da árvore e rolar o controle de exibição de árvore conforme necessário.

trans-unit.source: When the EnsureVisible method is called, the tree is expanded and scrolled to ensure that the current tree node is visible in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: Quando o método EnsureVisible é chamado, a árvore é expandida e rolada para garantir que o nó de árvore atual esteja visível no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you are selecting a tree node in code based on certain criteria.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é útil se você selecionar um nó de árvore no código com base em determinados critérios.

trans-unit.source: By calling this method after you select the node, the user can see and interact with the selected node.
trans-unit.target: Ao chamar este método depois de selecionar o nó, o usuário pode ver e interagir com o nó selecionado.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ItemHeight%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to a value that is larger than the height of the tree view control, calling this method has unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ItemHeight%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é definida como um valor que é maior do que a altura do controle de exibição de árvore, chamar esse método tem resultados inesperados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ItemHeight%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Expands the tree node.
trans-unit.target: Expande o nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The Expand method expands the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> down to the next level of nodes.
trans-unit.target: O método de expansão expande atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>até o próximo nível de nós.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The state of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> is persisted.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O estado de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>é persistente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the next level of child nodes was not collapsed previously, when the Expand method is called, the child nodes appear in their previously expanded state.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o próximo nível de nós filho não foi recolhido anteriormente, quando o método de expansão é chamado, os nós filho aparecem em seu estado expandido anteriormente.

trans-unit.source: Expands all the child tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: Expande todos os nós de árvore filho.

trans-unit.source: The ExpandAll method expands all the child tree nodes assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: O método expandir toda expande todos os nós de árvore filho com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The state of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> is persisted.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O estado de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>é persistente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the next level of child nodes was not collapsed previously, when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A> method is called, the child nodes appear in their previously expanded state.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o próximo nível de nós filho não foi recolhido anteriormente, quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A>método é chamado, os nós filho aparecem no estado expandido anteriormente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the first child tree node in the tree node collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o primeiro filho nó de árvore na coleção de nós de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The FirstNode is the first child <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection> stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> property of the current tree node.
trans-unit.target: O primeironó é o primeiro filho <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>armazenados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>propriedade do nó de árvore atual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> has no child tree node, the FirstNode property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>não tem nenhum nó de árvore filho, retorna a propriedade primeironó `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The first child <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes*> collection.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro filho <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes*>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of the tree node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor de primeiro plano do nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: If `null`, the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> used is the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> property value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control that the tree node is assigned to.
trans-unit.target: Se `null`, o <xref:System.Drawing.Color>usado é o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>valor da propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controle que o nó de árvore está atribuído.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: The foreground <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the tree node.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro plano <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> do nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: Returns the tree node with the specified handle and assigned to the specified tree view control.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o nó de árvore com especificado manipular e atribuído a árvore especificada de controle de exibição.

trans-unit.source: When a node is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control sends an NM_CUSTOMDRAW notification before the node handle is available.
trans-unit.target: Quando um nó é adicionado para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>coleção, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controle envia uma notificação de NM_CUSTOMDRAW antes do identificador do nó está disponível.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> to provide custom drawing in response to this notification, you should always check the return value of this method for `null` before you attempt to access the node.
trans-unit.target: Se você substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A>método o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>para fornecer desenho personalizado em resposta a essa notificação, você sempre deve verificar o valor de retorno deste método para `null` antes de tentar acessar o nó.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> that contains the tree node.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> que contém o nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The handle of the tree node.
trans-unit.target: O identificador do nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> that represents the tree node assigned to the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control with the specified handle.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> que representa o nó de árvore atribuído ao especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> controle com o identificador especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the path from the root tree node to the current tree node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o caminho do nó de árvore de raiz para o nó de árvore atual.

trans-unit.source: The path consists of the labels of all the tree nodes that must be navigated to reach this tree node, starting at the root tree node.
trans-unit.target: O caminho consiste em rótulos de todos os nós de árvore devem ser navegados para chegar a este nó de árvore, começando no nó de árvore de raiz.

trans-unit.source: The node labels are separated by the delimiter character specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control that contains this node.
trans-unit.target: Os rótulos de nó são separados pelo caractere delimitador especificado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controle que contém este nó.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the delimiter character of the tree view control named "Location" is set to the backslash character, (\\), the FullPath property value is "Country\Region\State".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o caractere delimitador de controle de exibição de árvore denominado "Local" é definido como o caractere de barra invertida (\\), o valor da propriedade FullPath é "Country\Region\State".

trans-unit.source: The path from the root tree node to the current tree node.
trans-unit.target: O caminho do nó de árvore de raiz para o nó de árvore atual.

trans-unit.source: The node is not contained in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nó não está contido em uma <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of child tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o número de nós de árvore filho.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the resulting count includes all tree nodes indirectly rooted at this tree node; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a contagem resultante inclui todos os nós de árvore indiretamente vinculados a este nó de árvore; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of child tree nodes assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes*> collection.
trans-unit.target: O número de nós de árvore filho com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes*>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the handle of the tree node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o identificador do nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: If a handle is not already created when the Handle property is referenced, it is created.
trans-unit.target: Se um identificador ainda não foi criado quando o identificador de propriedade é referenciado, ele será criado.

trans-unit.source: The tree node handle.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image list index value of the image displayed when the tree node is in the unselected state.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de índice de lista de imagem da imagem exibida quando o nó de árvore está no estado desmarcado.

trans-unit.source: The ImageIndex value is the index value of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor de ImageIndex é o valor de índice um <xref:System.Drawing.Image>armazenados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>atribuído para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The default value of the ImageIndex property is the same as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> is assigned to.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O valor padrão da propriedade ImageIndex é igual a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlar o que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>é atribuído a.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageKey%2A> and ImageIndex properties are mutually exclusive; therefore, if one property is set, the other is ignored.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageKey%2A>e ImageIndex propriedades são mutuamente exclusivas; portanto, se uma propriedade é definida, a outra será ignorada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageKey%2A> property, the ImageIndex property is automatically set to -1.
trans-unit.target: Se você definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageKey%2A>, a propriedade ImageIndex é automaticamente definida como -1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you set ImageIndex, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageKey%2A> is automatically set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, se você definir ImageIndex, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageKey%2A>é definida automaticamente como uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("").</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index value that represents the image position in the assigned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de índice de base zero que representa a posição da imagem em atribuída <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key for the image associated with this tree node when the node is in an unselected state.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a chave para a imagem associada a este nó de árvore quando o nó está em um estado desmarcado.

trans-unit.source: The image key returned by this property is contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A> property of the containing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: A chave de imagem retornada por essa propriedade está contida no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A>propriedade do que contém <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ImageKey is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: ImageKey diferencia maiusculas de minúsculas.

trans-unit.source: The ImageKey and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A> properties are mutually exclusive; if one property is set, the other is ignored.
trans-unit.target: ImageKey e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A>propriedades são mutuamente exclusivas; se uma propriedade é definida, a outra será ignorada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the ImageKey property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A> property is automatically set to -1.
trans-unit.target: Se você definir a propriedade ImageKey, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A>propriedade é definida automaticamente como -1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A>, ImageKey is automatically set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, se você definir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A>, ImageKey é definida automaticamente como uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("").</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The key for the image associated with this tree node when the node is in an unselected state.
trans-unit.target: A chave para a imagem associada a este nó de árvore quando o nó está em um estado desmarcado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the position of the tree node in the tree node collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a posição do nó de árvore na coleção de nós de árvore.

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index value that represents the position of the tree node in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes*> collection.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de índice de base zero que representa a posição do nó de árvore de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes*>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the tree node is in an editable state.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o nó de árvore está no estado editável.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the tree node is in editable state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o nó de árvore está no estado editável. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the tree node is in the expanded state.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o nó de árvore está no estado expandido.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the tree node is in the expanded state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o nó de árvore está no estado expandido; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the tree node is in the selected state.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o nó de árvore está no estado selecionado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the tree node is in the selected state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o nó de árvore está no estado selecionado; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the tree node is visible or partially visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o nó de árvore está visível ou parcialmente visíveis.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the tree node is visible or partially visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o nó de árvore está visível ou parcialmente visíveis; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the last child tree node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o último filho de nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The LastNode is the last child <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection> stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> property of the current tree node.
trans-unit.target: O LastNode é o último filho <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>armazenados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>propriedade do nó de árvore atual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> has no child tree node, the LastNode property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>não tem nenhum nó de árvore filho, retorna a propriedade LastNode `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> that represents the last child tree node.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> que representa o último nó de árvore filho.

trans-unit.source: Gets the zero-based depth of the tree node in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a profundidade de base zero do nó de árvore de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: For the Level property, the root node is considered the first level of nesting and returns 0.
trans-unit.target: Para a propriedade de nível, o nó raiz é considerado o primeiro nível de aninhamento e retornará 0.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based depth of the tree node in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A profundidade de base zero do nó de árvore de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the tree node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The Name of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> is also the node's key, when the node is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O nome de uma mensagem <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>é também chave do nó, quando o nó faz parte de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: If the node does not have a name, Name returns an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Se o nó não tem um nome, nome retorna uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the name of the tree node.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que representa o nome do nó de árvore.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the next sibling tree node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o próximo irmão nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The NextNode is the next sibling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection> stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> property of the tree node's parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: O NextNode é o próximo irmão <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>armazenado na <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>propriedade do pai do nó de árvore <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: If there is no next tree node, the NextNode property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhum próximo nó de árvore, a propriedade NextNode retorna `null`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> that represents the next sibling tree node.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> que representa o próximo nó de árvore de irmão.

trans-unit.source: Gets the next visible tree node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o próximo nó de árvore visível.

trans-unit.source: The NextVisibleNode can be a child, sibling, or a tree node from another branch.
trans-unit.target: O NextVisibleNode pode ser um nó de árvore de outra ramificação, irmão ou um filho.

trans-unit.source: If there is no next tree node, the NextVisibleNode property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhum próximo nó de árvore, a propriedade NextVisibleNode retorna `null`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> that represents the next visible tree node.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> que representa o próximo nó de árvore visível.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font that is used to display the text on the tree node label.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a fonte usada para exibir o texto no rótulo do nó da árvore.

trans-unit.source: If `null`, the <xref:System.Drawing.Font> used is the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> property value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control that this node is attached to.
trans-unit.target: Se `null`, o <xref:System.Drawing.Font>usado é o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>valor da propriedade a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>que este nó é anexado ao controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Font>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the node font is larger than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> property value that is set in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control, the tree node label text is clipped.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se a fonte do nó é maior do que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>valor da propriedade que está definida no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controle, o texto de rótulo do nó de árvore é recortado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> that is used to display the text on the tree node label.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> que é usado para exibir o texto no rótulo do nó da árvore.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> objects assigned to the current tree node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> objetos atribuídos ao nó de árvore atual.

trans-unit.source: The Nodes property can hold a collection of other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de nós pode conter uma coleção de outros <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: Each of the tree node in the collection has a Nodes property that can contain its own <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Cada nó de árvore na coleção tem uma propriedade de nós que pode conter seu próprio <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: This nesting of tree nodes can make it difficult to navigate a tree structure.
trans-unit.target: Este aninhamento de nós de árvore pode dificultar navegar de uma estrutura de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A> property makes it easier to determine your location in a tree.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A>propriedade torna mais fácil determinar o local em uma árvore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> that represents the tree nodes assigned to the current tree node.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> que representa os nós de árvore atribuídos ao nó de árvore atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent tree node of the current tree node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o pai de nó de árvore do nó de árvore atual.

trans-unit.source: If the tree node is at the root level, the Parent property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se o nó da árvore está no nível raiz, a propriedade Parent retornará `null`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> that represents the parent of the current tree node.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> que representa o pai do nó de árvore atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the previous sibling tree node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o irmão anterior de nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The PrevNode is the previous sibling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection> stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> property of the tree node's parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: O PrevNode é o anterior irmão <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>armazenado na <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>propriedade do pai do nó de árvore <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: If there is no previous tree node, the PrevNode property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhum nó de árvore anterior, a propriedade PrevNode retorna `null`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> that represents the previous sibling tree node.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> que representa o nó de árvore do irmão anterior.

trans-unit.source: Gets the previous visible tree node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nó de árvore visível anterior.

trans-unit.source: The PrevVisibleNode can be a child, sibling, or a tree node from another branch.
trans-unit.target: O PrevVisibleNode pode ser um nó de árvore de outra ramificação, irmão ou um filho.

trans-unit.source: If there is no previous tree node, the PrevVisibleNode property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhum nó de árvore anterior, a propriedade PrevVisibleNode retorna `null`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> that represents the previous visible tree node.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> que representa o nó de árvore visível anterior.

trans-unit.source: Removes the current tree node from the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: Remove o nó de árvore atual de controle de exibição de árvore.

trans-unit.source: When the Remove method is called, the tree node, and any child tree nodes that are assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>, are removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: Quando o método Remove é chamado, o nó de árvore e nós de árvore filho que são atribuídos ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>são removidos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The removed child nodes are removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> but are still attached to this tree node.
trans-unit.target: Os nós filho removido são removidos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>, mas ainda estão anexados a este nó de árvore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image list index value of the image that is displayed when the tree node is in the selected state.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de índice de lista de imagem da imagem que é exibida quando o nó de árvore está no estado selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The SelectedImageIndex value is the index value of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor de SelectedImageIndex é o valor de índice um <xref:System.Drawing.Image>armazenados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>atribuído para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The default value of the SelectedImageIndex property is the same as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> is assigned to.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O valor padrão da propriedade SelectedImageIndex é igual a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlar o que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>é atribuído a.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index value that represents the image position in an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de índice de base zero que representa a posição da imagem em um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key of the image displayed in the tree node when it is in a selected state.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a chave da imagem exibida no nó de árvore quando ele está em um estado selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The image key returned by this property is contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: A chave de imagem retornada por essa propriedade está contida no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A>propriedade do pai <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A>

trans-unit.source: The key of the image displayed when the tree node is in a selected state.
trans-unit.target: A chave da imagem exibida quando o nó de árvore está no estado selecionado.

trans-unit.source: Saves the state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Salva o estado do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> especificado <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that describes the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> que descreve o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that indicates the state of the stream during serialization
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>que indica o estado do fluxo durante a serialização</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the image that is used to indicate the state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> when the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> has its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes*> property set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o índice da imagem que é usado para indicar o estado do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> quando o pai <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> tem seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes*>propriedade definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes*>

trans-unit.source: The image index that is returned by this property is contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: O índice de imagem que é retornado por essa propriedade está contido no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>propriedade do pai <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> has check boxes enabled, the StateImageIndex is ignored and the node will display the first or second image in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> set on the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> to indicate an unchecked or checked state, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Se o pai <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>tem caixas de seleção habilitadas, o StateImageIndex será ignorado e o nó será exibida a primeira ou segunda imagem no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>definido no pai <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>para indicar um estado marcado ou desmarcado, respectivamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: Toggling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A> property does not affect the value of the StateImageIndex.
trans-unit.target: Alternando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>propriedade não afeta o valor de StateImageIndex.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: The StateImageIndex returns -1 when not set.
trans-unit.target: O StateImageIndex retorna -1 quando não definida.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageKey%2A> and StateImageIndex properties are mutually exclusive, meaning if one is set, the other is ignored.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageKey%2A>e StateImageIndex propriedades são mutuamente exclusivas, que significa que se um for definido, a outra será ignorada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageKey%2A> property, the StateImageIndex property is automatically set to -1.
trans-unit.target: Se você definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageKey%2A>, a propriedade StateImageIndex é automaticamente definida como -1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you set StateImageIndex, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageKey%2A> is automatically set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, se você definir StateImageIndex, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageKey%2A>é definida automaticamente como uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("").</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the image that is used to indicate the state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O índice da imagem que é usado para indicar o estado do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified index is less than -1 or greater than 14.
trans-unit.target: O índice especificado é menor que -1 ou maior do que 14.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key of the image that is used to indicate the state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> when the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> has its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes*> property set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a chave da imagem que é usada para indicar o estado do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> quando o pai <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> tem seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes*>propriedade definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes*>

trans-unit.source: The image key that is returned by this property is contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: A chave de imagem que é retornada por essa propriedade está contida no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>propriedade do pai <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> has check boxes enabled, the StateImageKey is ignored and the node will display the first or second image in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> set on the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> to indicate an unchecked or checked state, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Se o pai <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>tem caixas de seleção habilitadas, o StateImageKey será ignorado e o nó será exibida a primeira ou segunda imagem no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>definido no pai <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>para indicar um estado marcado ou desmarcado, respectivamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: Toggling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A> property does not affect the value of the StateImageKey.
trans-unit.target: Alternando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>propriedade não afeta o valor de StateImageKey.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: The StateImageKey and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageIndex%2A> properties are mutually exclusive, meaning if one is set, the other is ignored.
trans-unit.target: O StateImageKey e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageIndex%2A>propriedades são mutuamente exclusivas, que significa que se um for definido, a outra será ignorada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the StateImageKey property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageIndex%2A> property is automatically set to -1.
trans-unit.target: Se você definir a propriedade StateImageKey, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageIndex%2A>propriedade é definida automaticamente como -1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageIndex%2A>, StateImageKey is automatically set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, se você definir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageIndex%2A>, StateImageKey é definida automaticamente como uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("").</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: You should set the StateImageKey to an image with a corresponding index between 0 and 14.
trans-unit.target: Você deve definir o StateImageKey como uma imagem com um índice correspondente entre 0 e 14.

trans-unit.source: You can set the StateImageKey to an image with an index value greater than 14 (an exception will not be thrown), but the image may not be displayed
trans-unit.target: Você pode definir o StateImageKey para uma imagem com um valor de índice maior do que 14 (uma exceção não será lançada), mas a imagem não pode ser exibida

trans-unit.source: The key of the image that is used to indicate the state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A chave da imagem que é usada para indicar o estado do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Populates a serialization information object with the data needed to serialize the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Popula um objeto de informações de serialização com os dados necessários para serializar o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that contains the data to serialize the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> que contém os dados para serializar o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains the destination information for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>que contém as informações de destino desta serialização.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object that contains data about the tree node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o objeto que contém dados sobre o nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: Any <xref:System.Object> derived type can be assigned to this property.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer <xref:System.Object>tipo derivado pode ser atribuído a essa propriedade.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: If this property is being set through the Windows Forms designer, only text can be assigned.
trans-unit.target: Se essa propriedade está sendo definida por meio do designer de formulários do Windows, pode ser atribuído somente texto.

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Clone%2A> method performs a shallow copy of the node.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Clone%2A>método executa uma cópia superficial do nó.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Clone%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value of the Tag property is a reference type, both the original and cloned copy will point to the same single instance of the Tag value.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor da propriedade da marca é um tipo de referência, tanto a cópia original e clonada apontará para a mesma instância única do valor da marca.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains data about the tree node.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que contém dados sobre o nó de árvore.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed in the label of the tree node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto exibido na legenda do nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of characters that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> can display is 259.
trans-unit.target: O número máximo de caracteres que um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>pode exibir é 259.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.String> that has more than 259 characters is assigned to this property, only the first 259 characters are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.String>que tem mais de 259 caracteres é atribuído a essa propriedade, apenas os primeiro 259 caracteres serão exibidos.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by the user if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.LabelEdit%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não pode ser definida pelo usuário, se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.LabelEdit%2A>propriedade do pai <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>é definido como `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.LabelEdit%2A>
